name: Analysis Progress
desc: By initiating wargames and collecting the combat data therein, we can provide useful points of reference for the various commanders and analyze the abilities of various monsters, as well as how to effectively defeat them...

customize.name: Analysis Progress
customize.desc: By initiating wargames and collecting the combat data therein, we can provide useful points of reference for the various commanders and analyze the abilities of various monsters, as well as how to effectively defeat them...

customize.name: Cloudforged
customize.desc: A prototype for a standard-issue weapon the Yuheng commissioned from Blackcliff Forge after having analyzed the ancient mechanisms that protected the adeptal abode upon Tianheng.

customize.name: Analysis Progress
customize.desc: By initiating wargames and collecting the combat data therein, we can provide useful points of reference for the various commanders and analyze the abilities of various monsters, as well as how to effectively defeat them...

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Cam and Cables of Law
customize.desc:
Specialized refinement material for "Cloudforged."

A new type of component the Yuheng commissioned the Blackcliff Forge to make. According to the smiths, its dynamic load "wouldn't lose to adeptal mechanisms." By installing it on its counterpart prototype weapon, the latter's power can be considerably increased.

The world ruled by humanity is like the taut bowstring of a quality bow: It can only avoid snapping and collapsing with the appropriate quantity of tension.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Crown of Insight
customize.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.
